metric_notes.accuracy: Token-level accuracy: percent of tokens whose tag matches gold.
metric_notes.micro: Micro-averaged over tokens. For single-label token classification, micro precision/recall/F1 ≈ accuracy.
metric_notes.macro: Macro-averaged across labels (each label equal weight). Sensitive to rare labels.
